Qart
Gallery More Convert Text Save Share Revert AboutShare Scan cancelled Share via Please press back key again to exit Please input your own text to generate QR code, or press QR code button on the right Saved in file:///android_asset/pages/about-en.html Qart %s
Qart is used to generate QR code that merge a picture. So the QR code looks more beautiful. Please try it https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.scola.qart Invite to use Qart app Share via Close Converting QR code, please wait several second Choose color COLORFUL or BLACKWHITE Qart can generate colorful or blackwhite QR Code. Please select proper color to generate QR Code for higher recognition rate BLACKWHITE COLORFUL
